title: DHCPSubnetINfo
extract: When an end device is configured to dynamically learn its IP address from a DHCP server, three pieces of information are absolutely necessary: IP address, subnet mask, and default gateway. ... Configuring a DHCP server to hand out IP addresses on a subnet is known as a DHCP pool.Aug 30, 2016
extract_html: When an end device is configured to dynamically learn its IP address from a DHCP server, three pieces of information are absolutely necessary: IP address, subnet mask, and default gateway. ... Configuring a DHCP server to hand out IP addresses on a subnet is known as a DHCP pool.Aug 30, 2016
